Hello,

could you suggest me some good article /resource/ about the strategy how to add jUnit testing to a large existing JAVA project, please?
What is the best practice for this + some experience /e.g. typical problems to avoid.../?

/I didn't find any usefull document on the internet for this topic yet./

Thank you in advance,
Vladey.
